General_Description: '''Hungry Soldiers''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Even dried fish could not wait long for delivery, and so when the messenger a fisher used to deliver her catch did not appear, she feared the messenger was attacked.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
